message_def.name: QueryGlobalPose
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4402h: ReportGlobalPose message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryLocalPose
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4403h: ReportLocalPose message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryVelocityState
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4404h: ReportVelocityState message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryWrenchEffort
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4405h: ReportWrenchEffort message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryGlobalVector
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4407h: ReportGlobalVector message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryLocalVector
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4408h: ReportLocalVector message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryTravelSpeed
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 440Ah: ReportTravelSpeed message.

message_def.name: QueryGlobalWaypoint
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 440Ch: ReportGlobalWaypoint message. Field #1 specifies the fields to be returned in the Report Global Waypoint message.

message_def.name: QueryLocalWaypoint
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 440Dh: ReportLocalWaypoint message. Field #1 specifies the fields to be returned in the Report Local Waypoint message.

message_def.name: QueryGlobalPathSegment
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 440Fh: ReportGlobalPathSegment message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

fixed_field.name: PresenceVector
fixed_field.interpretation: See Report Global Path Segment Message

message_def.name: QueryLocalPathSegment
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4410h: ReportLocalPathSegment message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

fixed_field.name: PresenceVector
fixed_field.interpretation: See Report Local Path Segment Message

message_def.name: QueryGeomagneticProperty
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4412h: ReportGeomagneticProperty message.

message_def.name: QueryVelocityCommand
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4415h: ReportVelocityCommand message. Field #2 specifies the fields to be returned in the Report Velocity Command message.

message_def.name: QueryAccelerationLimit
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4416h: ReportAccelerationLimit message. Field #2 specifies the fields to be returned in the Report Acceleration Limit message.

message_def.name: QueryAccelerationState
message_def.description: This message shall cause the receiving component to reply to the requestor with a ID 4417h: ReportAccelerationState message. A logical AND shall be performed on the requested presence vector and that representing the available fields from the responder. The resulting message shall contain the fields indicated by the result of this logical AND operation.

message_def.name: QueryElement
message_def.description: This message is used to query an element from a list. The element is uniquely identified by the UID.

declared_fixed_field.name: ElementUID
declared_fixed_field.interpretation: UID of the queried element. A value of zero (0) represents the first (head) element in the list.

message_def.name: QueryElementList
message_def.description: This message is used to query all elements from a list.

message_def.name: QueryElementCount
message_def.description: This message is used to query the number of elements in a list.

message_def.name: QueryActiveElement
message_def.description: This message is used to query the current active element of an executing list.
